Title: Resident Evil
Overview: When a virus leaks from a top-secret facility, turning all resident researchers into ravenous zombies and their lab animals into mutated hounds from hell, the government sends in an elite military task force to contain the outbreak.
Tagline: A secret experiment. A deadly virus. A fatal mistake.
Keywords: undercover, mutant, dystopia, conspiracy, zombie, based on video game
production_companies: Impact Pictures, Davis-Films, New Legacy, Constantin Film Produktion
Cast: Milla Jovovich, Michelle Rodriguez, Eric Mabius
